channel.title: consistent-hash on SoByte
channel.description: Recent content in consistent-hash on SoByte

item.title: Consistent Hash Principle and GroupCache Source Code Analysis
item.description: Consistent Hash is often used to alleviate the problem of large cache failures caused by scaling up and down nodes in distributed caching systems. Consistent Hash is more of a load balancing strategy than a Hash algorithm. GroupCache is an official golang distributed cache library that includes a simple implementation of Consistent Hash. The code is available at github.com/golang/groupcache/consistenthash. This article will provide insight into the principles of Consistency Hash
